title: Proportunity Secures €2.3M in Seed Funding
text:
Proportunity, a London, UK-based fintech startup, raised €2.3M in seed funding.

Backers included Anthemis and Axel Springer Digital Ventures.

The company intends to use the funds to expand operations and its business reach by growing its network of partnerships with real estate agencies and mortgage brokers, as well as increasing its development efforts.

Founded in 2016 by Vadim Toader, CEO, and Stefan Boronea, CTO, Proportunity provides first time mortgage loans that can increase deposits by leveraging proprietary machine learning models that identify real-estate trends and future high-growth areas in the UK.

Authorized by FCA in 2018, the company has over 5,000 users.

FinSMEs

18/10/2019
